title: Column Model
description: A column model contains the metadata of a single column of a TableEntity

id.description: The immutable ID issued to new columns

name.description: The display name of the column

defaultValue.description: The default value for this column. Columns of type FILEHANDLEID and ENTITYID are not allowed to have default values.

columnType.description: The type of the column must be from this enumeration.
columnType.name: ColumnType

maximumSize.description: A parameter for columnTypes with a maximum size.  For example, ColumnType.STRINGs have a default maximum size of 50 characters, but can be set to a maximumSize of 1 to 1000 characters.

enumValues.description: Columns of type STRING can be constrained to an enumeration values set on this list. The maximum number of entries for an enum is 100

facetType.description: Set to one of the enumerated values to indicate this column should be treated as a facet. "Enumeration" will return the most frequently seen values and their counts; selecting these values will cause the table results to be filtered. "Range" will allow the table to be filtered by a chosen lower and upper bound; these bounds are inclusive.
